title: Bibliography of Measures of Complexity
desc: Covers the philosophical and practical references to the concept and measurement of domplexity.

title: The Collection of Computer Science Bibliographies
desc: A collection of 1200 bibliographies of scientific literature covering most aspects of computer science. The collection currently contains more than one million references and is updated monthly.

title: Conservation Bibliography  - BCIN
desc: Searchable database of records gathered by a worldwide network of contributors. Part of the Conservation Information Network.

title: CSAC Anthropology Bibliography
desc: Searchable references covering the general field of social anthropology in its broadest sense.

title: History of Australian Science and Technology Bibliography
desc: Bibliographical and archival database of Australian scientists with links to related articles and images. It includes both scientists who were Australian by birth and those who undertook significant scientific work in Australia.

title: International Ice Patrol
desc: A scientific bibliography of icebergs from the research and development centre of the U.S.Coastguards .

title: International System of Units
desc: Bibliography of links, citations and online publications of the SI, the modern metric system of measurement, a language universally used in science, that has become the dominant language of international commerce and trade.

title: Mathematica Information Center
desc: Listing of publications, articles and books.

title: Medical Cybernetics and Artificial Intelligence Bibliography
desc: Contains 62566 books, research papers, conference papers, journal articles from many subareas of artificial intelligence. From the University of Vienna and the Austrian Research Institute for artificial intelligence.

title: Natural History Bibliographies
desc: A substantial listing of links to natural history online bibliographies. From the University of Washington Libraries.

title: Non-Photorealistic Computer Graphics Library
desc: Searchable resource for scientific literature. Listed by year of publication and includes abstracts and related links.

title: Nonlinear Dynamics and Chaos
desc: Searchable and downloadable bibliography of scientific papers.

title: Scientific Visualization Bibliography
desc: Publications and research documents catalogued by title, author, and date.

title: Scientific Visualization Weblet Bibliography
desc: An annotated bibliography of all scientific visualization weblets, it is a service of the NAS applied research branch visualization group.

title: Sobralia Orchids Literature
desc: Listing of literature referencing Sobralia orchids, with frequent updates.

title: Stanhopea Orchids Literature
desc: Listing of known literature referencing Stanhopea orchids.

title: Stochastic Programming Bibliography
desc: Searchable database. Also offers a separate bibliography on Stochastic Integer Programming. Alternative formats in BibTeX and Adobe PDF.

title: USGS Toxics Program
desc: Toxic substances hydrology program bibliography database providing scientific information on the behavior of toxic substances in the nation's hydrologic environments.

title: Wolves:  A Bibliography and Guide to the Literature
desc: Provides worldwide coverage of the scientific literature about wolves for the years 1968 through 1987. The bibliography does not contain references published after 1987.

desc: Covers the philosophical and practical references to the concept and measurement of domplexity.

desc: Contains 62566 books, research papers, conference papers, journal articles from many subareas of artificial intelligence. From the University of Vienna and the Austrian Research Institute for artificial intelligence.

title: Annual Egyptological Bibliography
desc: Publication of the International Association of Egyptologists.  Issues available online.

title: Natural History Bibliographies
desc: A substantial listing of links to natural history online bibliographies. From the University of Washington Libraries.

title: The Bibliography of Ancient Egypt
desc: Categorized listing of books, cd-roms, videos, cds and audiobooks with much information, including ISBNs, publisher and reviews.

title: Non-Photorealistic Computer Graphics Library
desc: Searchable resource for scientific literature. Listed by year of publication and includes abstracts and related links.

title: Bibliography of Mesoamerica
desc: Provides 100,000 titles relating to ancient cultures of Mexico, Guatemala, Honduras, Belize, and El Salvador.

title: Nonlinear Dynamics and Chaos
desc: Searchable and downloadable bibliography of scientific papers.

title: Bibliography of the Borgia Family
desc: Listing of books and other media from Alonso Borgia (Pope Calixtus III), to Rodrigo Borgia (Pope Alexander VI) on to Caesare, Lucrezia and Saint Francis Borgia. Full listing also available in pdf format.

title: Scientific Visualization Bibliography
desc: Publications and research documents catalogued by title, author, and date.

title: Bibliography of the Czech History
desc: Searchable database of literature of the history of the Czech Lands published after the year 1990.  (Czech, English, German)

title: Scientific Visualization Weblet Bibliography
desc: An annotated bibliography of all scientific visualization weblets, it is a service of the NAS applied research branch visualization group.

title: Books About the Picts
desc: Bibliography on the Picts, the pre-Scottish people of northern Britain, and their culture.

title: Sobralia Orchids Literature
desc: Listing of literature referencing Sobralia orchids, with frequent updates.

title: c18 Bibliographies On-Line
desc: A series of selective, annotated bibliographies on figures from the long eighteenth century, available freely over the world wide web. Includes standard scholarly editions, bibliographies, reference works, biographies, and the major works of criticism.

title: Stanhopea Orchids Literature
desc: Listing of known literature referencing Stanhopea orchids.

title: The Center for Holocaust and Genocide Studies at the University of Minnesota
desc: A database of relevant books and articles that can be searched by author or subject related to the study of the holocaust and contemporary genocide and teaching about the subject.

title: Stochastic Programming Bibliography
desc: Searchable database. Also offers a separate bibliography on Stochastic Integer Programming. Alternative formats in BibTeX and Adobe PDF.

title: Civil War Regimental History Books
desc: A bibliography of regimental histories from the Civil War, divided by state, with links to regiment web sites.

title: USGS Toxics Program
desc: Toxic substances hydrology program bibliography database providing scientific information on the behavior of toxic substances in the nation's hydrologic environments.

title: Wolves:  A Bibliography and Guide to the Literature
desc: Provides worldwide coverage of the scientific literature about wolves for the years 1968 through 1987. The bibliography does not contain references published after 1987.

title: Diary Research Website
desc: The principal content of the site is a searchable, free access, annotated bibliography of diaries printed in English.

title: From Smithson to Smithsonian
desc: Bibliography on the history of the Smithsonian Institution.

title: Iter: Gateway to the Middle Ages and Renaissance
desc: Covers literature pertaining to the Middle Ages and Renaissance (400-1700). Includes citations for journal articles, reviews, review articles, bibliographies, catalogues, abstracts and discographies.

title: Medieval Bestiary: Animals in the Middle Ages
desc: Annotated listing of materials related to the genre and on the subject of "animals in the Middle Ages" in general. Also listings by author and subject.
